commit.message:
Auto merge of #60073 - rchaser53:issue-60049, r=estebank

avoid type-check body of DefId

fix: #60049
related: PR #59798

files.patch:

               found type `fn(i64) -> i64 {bar}`
 
-error: aborting due to 7 previous errors
